name: MegaTraveller 2: Quest for the Ancients
description:
MegaTraveller 2: Quest for the Ancients is a RPG game developed by Paragon Software. It was originally released in 1991. Paragon Software published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play MegaTraveller 2: Quest for the Ancients on Commodore / Amiga and PC.
Michael Powell scored the game.
